name: stock_get_daily_dividend_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_v2.
Tool description: 
API description: Fetch and return the daily dividend data for a given stock symbol within a specified date range.

symbol.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\"AAPL\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

end_date.description: end_date should be entered in the 'YYYY-MM-DD' format and is the last day that data will be pulled for.

start_date.description: start_date should be entered in the 'YYYY-MM-DD' format and is the first day that data will be pulled for.

region.description:
One of the following is allowed
US|BR|AU|CA|FR|DE|HK|IN|IT|ES|GB|S
